cmake-modules-collectionÂ¶

The modules listed here are part of the CMake Modules Collection. Projects may provide further modules; their location(s) can be specified in the CMAKE_MODULE_PATH variable.

These modules are loaded using the include() command. They provide a single public function responsible for dispatching multiple operations, internally using private macros. Only one public command is exposed per module.

  • BinaryTarget
  • Debug
  • Dependency
  • Directory
  • FileManip
  • Map
  • Print
  • StringManip

BinaryTarget
